Simple models are the basics blocks for more complicated time series models

```{r}
library(itsmr)
```


## Normal Noise - iid

```{r}
w = rnorm(500,mean=0,sd=1)
plot.ts(w, main="IID Noise")
plota(w)
```

## Random Walk

```{r}
w = rnorm(500,mean=0,sd=1)
s = cumsum(w)
plot.ts(s, main="Random Walk")
plota(s)
```
